author: Stereogum
title: LCD Soundsystem Share Album Update: “Still Working On It, But It’ll Be Done Soon”
text: LCD Soundsystem made a grand return on Christmas Eve 2015 and spent most of last year touring on the excitement surrounding their reunion . In James Murphy's note explaining why the old gang was getting back together so soon after they called it quits, he said that he was working on a new … More »
